verses.text: \w Speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* rashly, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w hasty|strong="H4116"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* utter \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thou \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w few|strong="H4592"\w*.

\w Dreams|strong="H2472"\w* follow \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w cares|strong="H6045"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* found folly.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, defer \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* unfaithful \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* promise displeaseth \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* whatsoever thou hast \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*, \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0834"\w* \w vow|strong="H5087"\w*, \w than|strong="H3808"\w* after \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0834"\w* perform \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w promised|strong="H5087"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*: There \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* providence: lest \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w words|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* destroy \w all|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

Where \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, \w there|strong="H7230"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* without \w number|strong="H7230"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* do thou \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* oppressions \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* violent \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* perverted \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, \w wonder|strong="H8539"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w matter|strong="H2656"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* hath another \w higher|strong="H1364"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* there \w are|strong="H4941"\w* others still \w higher|strong="H1364"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* these:

Moreover \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* reigneth \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w subject|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H5647"\w*.

\w A|strong="H2088"\w* covetous man \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* loveth riches \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* reap \w no|strong="H3808"\w* fruit \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w them|strong="H0157"\w*: \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.

\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* there \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w great|strong="H2896"\w* riches, there \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w*. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w it|strong="H0518"\w* profit \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* seeth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* riches \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*?

\w Sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* labouring \w man|strong="H6223"\w*, \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w*: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* fulness \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* suffer \w him|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* also \w another|strong="H3426"\w* grievous \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, which \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*: \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* hurt \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H0369"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w lost|strong="H0006"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* very great affliction: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* extremity \w of|strong="H1121"\w* want.

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w motherâ€™s|strong="H0517"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* labour.

\w A|strong="H0935"\w* most deplorable \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w return|strong="H0935"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w then|strong="H3651"\w* doth \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w profit|strong="H3504"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* hath laboured \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*?

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* eateth \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* cares, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* misery, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* sorrow.

\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w seemed|strong="H7200"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w enjoy|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H5999"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* labour, wherewith \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath laboured \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* substance, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* power \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* enjoy \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* labour: \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gift|strong="H4991"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* entertaineth \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w delight|strong="H8057"\w*,
